name: Virgin Atlantic Upper Class: MY BEST FLIGHT YET!
description:
I flew Virgin Atlantic Upper Class on their Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner from London to Los Angeles, which ended up being my favourite flight I've ever taken! #virginatlantic #businessclass #upperclass #virginbusinessclass

Airline: Virgin Atlantic
Flight: VS23
Aircraft: Boeing 787-9 G-VYUM
From: London (LHR)
To: Los Angeles (LAX)
Departure: 15:53
Arrival: 17:58
Flight Time: 10:05
Seat: 6A
